EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.Richard Seroter-ENGLISH 6-12-18 All DBs
EmailTemplate.subject: Hot Summer Updates - new sessions and speakers announced for S1P
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
What do the co-creator of Apache Kafka, a Navy SEAL, and CIO of Boeing have in common? They’re all on the main stage at the upcoming SpringOne Platform 2018 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]>! I’m working hard to find the most interesting, engaging, and inspiring keynotes possible. Add that to the hundreds of fascinating breakout sessions, and you’ve got a conference you just can’t afford to miss.
Neha Narkhede Confluent
Chris Fussell McChrystal Group
Ted Colbert Boeing
I’d like to invite you to join me at SpringOne Platform 2018 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=s1p&utm_campaign=springone&utm_term=q218]]> in Washington, D.C., from September 24–27. This is where many of the the world’s largest and most influential companies come to learn how to build terrific software that matters. Hear about the latest innovations with our Spring frameworks, Kubernetes, Cloud Foundry, serverless, cloud-scale architecture, modern operations, scalable data strategies, and more. Take advantage of hundreds of breakout sessions <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/sessions?utm_source=email&utm_medium=s1p&utm_campaign=springone&utm_term=q218]]>, a dozen or so keynotes, onsite training <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/training?utm_source=email&utm_medium=s1p&utm_campaign=springone&utm_term=q218]]>, and countless networking opportunities.
There is still time to get discounted conference pricing and reduced training prices. Use code S1P200_RSeroter for an additional $200 off registration. If you register before July 31st, 11:59pm PDT, that’s a total of $400 off a full-priced standard pass. Register now <[[https://springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=email&utm_medium=s1p&utm_campaign=springone&utm_term=q218]]> and save $400!
I look forward to seeing you there, Richard
